channel.title: Might and Magic VI on GoG
channel.description:
[url]https://www.gog.com/en/gamecard/might_and_magic_6_limited_edition[/url]
Seriously, this is THE best RPG I ever played. I remember playing it back in 1998 when it was just out.
[u]400 hours[/u] of gameplay, incredible story, epic battles, hundreds and hundreds of quests. Seriously guys, BUY IT NOW. Plus it comes with the five previous M&Ms.
